meanings.definition: To adjust or set to zero again.
meanings.sent1: I had to rezeroing the scale after it showed the wrong weight.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is rezeroing the machine to ensure accurate measurements.
meanings.sent3: After the robot kept bumping into walls, it decided to rezeroing its navigation system.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was rezeroing her life after a major setback.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the students to rezeroing their calculators before the exam.

meanings.definition: The act of recalibrating to zero.
meanings.sent1: The rezeroing of the instrument was necessary for precise readings.
meanings.sent2: During the experiment, the scientist performed a rezeroing of the device.
meanings.sent3: The rezeroing of the compass led the hikers in circles instead of the right direction.
meanings.sent4: The rezeroing of the clock symbolized a fresh start for the family.
meanings.sent5: The rezeroing of the scale made sure the measurements were accurate for the recipe.
